scripts.build: npm run install-deps && npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && npm ci --include=dev && cd ../frontend && npm ci --include=dev
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npx vite build && mkdir -p ../backend/public && cp -r dist/* ../backend/public/
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev:ts" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && mkdir -p backend/dist/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/dist/public && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/public/* && rm -rf frontend/dist/* && rm -rf backend/dist/*
